name: Genuine Tech Support Request
description: Friend asking for help with a WiFi issue after a Windows update. Should NOT trigger scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Hey, my laptop isn't connecting to WiFi after the Windows update. Can you help?
turns.notes: Simple tech help request from a friend

turns.scammer_message: I tried restarting but it still shows 'No internet access'. The icon has a yellow triangle.
turns.notes: Describing the technical problem in detail

turns.scammer_message: Yes, other devices are connecting fine. It's just this laptop. It was working yesterday before the update.
That worked! I went to Device Manager, uninstalled the WiFi adapter, and restarted. It's connecting now!
Thanks so much for the help! You saved me a trip to the service center.
turns.notes: Grateful closing with no suspicious elements
